content.query:
---PRODUTO


SELECT  
mara.MATNR
,mara.J_3APGNR
,mara.MTART
,mara.PRDHA
,mara.MATKL
,mara.MSTAE
,mara.LVORM
,mara.MEINS
,mara.BSTME
,mara.ERSDA
,mara.MAGRV
,makt.MAKTX
,makt.MAKTG
--,GrupoProduto.grupoproduto
--,GrupoCampanha.grupoCampanha
,ztpp_re_001.ZZMARCA
,ztpp_re_001.ZZMARCADESC
,ztpp_re_003.ZZDESTCONFEC
,ztpp_re_003.ZZDESTCONFECD
,ztpp_re_004.ZZCATPROD
,ztpp_re_004.ZZCATPRODESC
,ztpp_re_005.ZZESPECIE
,ztpp_re_005.ZZESPECIEDESC
,ztpp_re_007.ZZCATLPROD
,ztpp_re_007.ZZCATLPRODDESC
,ztpp_re_011.ZZGENERO
,ztpp_re_011.DESCRICAO as DESCRICAO_re_011
,ztpp_re_012.ZZSEGMENTO
,ztpp_re_012.DESCRICAO as DESCRICAO_re_012
into sap_produto_smp
FROM 

[cleansing_data].[sap_mara] as mara
inner join [cleansing_data].[sap_makt] as makt on mara.MATNR = makt.MATNR
inner join vw_ausp_175 as ausp_175 on ausp_175.OBJEK = mara.MATNR

left join vw_ausp_275 as ausp_275 on ausp_275.OBJEK = mara.MATNR
left join vw_ausp_141 as ausp_141 on ausp_141.OBJEK = mara.MATNR
left join vw_ausp_139 as ausp_139 on ausp_139.OBJEK = mara.MATNR
left join vw_ausp_144 as ausp_144 on ausp_144.OBJEK = mara.MATNR
left join vw_ausp_148 as ausp_148 on ausp_148.OBJEK = mara.MATNR
left join vw_ausp_140 as ausp_140 on ausp_140.OBJEK = mara.MATNR

--left join vwGrupoProduto as GrupoProduto on  GrupoProduto.codigoproduto =  right(mara.MATNR ,10)  
--left join vwGrupoCampanha as GrupoCampanha on  GrupoCampanha.codigoproduto =  right(mara.MATNR ,10)

left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_001] as ztpp_re_001 on ztpp_re_001.ZZMARCA = ausp_175.ATWRT
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_003] as ztpp_re_003 on ztpp_re_003.ZZDESTCONFEC = ausp_141.ATWRT

left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_005] as ztpp_re_005 on ztpp_re_005.ZZESPECIE = ausp_275.ATWRT
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_007] as ztpp_re_007 on ztpp_re_007.ZZCATLPROD = ausp_139.ATWRT
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_011] as ztpp_re_011 on ztpp_re_011.ZZGENERO = ausp_144.ATWRT
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_012] as ztpp_re_012 on ztpp_re_012.ZZSEGMENTO = ausp_148.ATWRT
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_ztpp_re_004] as ztpp_re_004 on ztpp_re_004.ZZCATPROD = ausp_140.ATWRT

where mara.MATNR = '000000001000001768'
 
 select top(1) *  from [dbo].[planilha_produto]

 select  right(matnr,10), * from  sap_produto_smp



/* GRADE */  
select 
sap_ausp.OBJEK	
--,sap_ausp.ATINN	
--,sap_ausp.ATZHL	
--,sap_ausp.MAFID	
--,sap_ausp.KLART	
--,sap_ausp.ATWRT
--,sap_cawn.ATWRT
--,sap_cawn.ATINN
--,concat(sap_cawn.ATINN,sap_cawn.ATZHL) as chavewn
--,concat(sap_cawnt.ATINN,sap_cawnt.ATZHL) as chavent
,sap_cawnt.ATWTB AS DESCRICAO_GRADE
from [cleansing_data].[sap_ausp] as sap_ausp
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_cawn] as sap_cawn on sap_ausp.atinn = sap_cawn.atinn
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_cawnt]  as sap_cawnt on concat(sap_cawn.ATINN,sap_cawn.ATZHL) =  concat(sap_cawnt.ATINN,sap_cawnt.ATZHL)
where sap_ausp.ATINN = '0000000267' AND sap_cawn.ATINN = '0000000267'
AND sap_ausp.OBJEK = '000000001000000040'


 
  

/* MATERIAL PERMANENCIA */
select 
sap_ausp.OBJEK	
--,sap_ausp.ATINN	
--,sap_ausp.ATZHL	
--,sap_ausp.MAFID	
--,sap_ausp.KLART	
--,sap_ausp.ATWRT
--,sap_cawn.ATWRT
--,sap_cawn.ATINN
--,concat(sap_cawn.ATINN,sap_cawn.ATZHL) as chavewn
--,concat(sap_cawnt.ATINN,sap_cawnt.ATZHL) as chavent  
,sap_cawnt.ATWTB AS DESCRICAO_PERMANENCIA
from [cleansing_data].[sap_ausp] as sap_ausp
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_cawn] as sap_cawn on sap_ausp.ATWRT = sap_cawn.ATWRT
left join [cleansing_data].[sap_cawnt]  as sap_cawnt on concat(sap_cawn.ATINN,sap_cawn.ATZHL) =  concat(sap_cawnt.ATINN,sap_cawnt.ATZHL)
where sap_ausp.ATINN = '0000000816' AND sap_cawn.ATINN = '0000000816'
AND sap_ausp.OBJEK = '000000001000000040'



/* CAMPOS DO PLANILH√ÉO*/
ZZMARCADESC =  [MARCA PARA]
DESCRICAO_re_011 = [GENERO PARA], 
DESCRICAO_re_012 = [SEGMENTO PARA],
ZZESPECIEDESC = [ESPECIE PARA]
GRUPO_PRODUTO = [GRUPO DE PRODUTO PARA], 
SUB_GRUPO_PRODUTO = [SUB GRUPO DE PRODUTO PARA]
ZZDESTCONFECD = [DESTINO CONFECCAO PARA]
DESCRICAO_GRADE =  [GRADE PARA]
DESCRICAO_PERMANENCIA = [PERMANENCIA PARA]

--/* SUBLINHA */
--select  
--sap_ausp.OBJEK	
----,sap_ausp.ATINN	
----,sap_ausp.ATZHL	
----,sap_ausp.MAFID	
----,sap_ausp.KLART	
----,sap_ausp.ATWRT
----,sap_cawn.ATWRT
----,sap_cawn.ATINN
----,sap_cawn.ATWRT
----,sap_cawn.ATINN
----,concat(sap_cawn.ATINN,sap_cawn.ATZHL) as chavewn
----,concat(sap_cawnt.ATINN,sap_cawnt.ATZHL) as chavent
--,sap_cawnt.ATWTB DESCRICAO_SUBLINHA
--from [cleansing_data].[sap_ausp] as sap_ausp
--left join [cleansing_data].[sap_cawn] as sap_cawn on sap_ausp.ATWRT = sap_cawn.ATWRT
--left join [cleansing_data].[sap_cawnt]  as sap_cawnt on concat(sap_cawn.ATINN,sap_cawn.ATZHL) =  concat(sap_cawnt.ATINN,sap_cawnt.ATZHL)
--where sap_ausp.ATINN	 = '0000000829' AND sap_cawn.ATINN = '0000000829'
--AND sap_ausp.OBJEK	 = '000000001000000040'




select * from  [cleansing_data].[sap_kna1]
